summary: Skyrim Portals adds \'The Nexus\' a Room containing Teleports to all of Skyrim\'s main cities.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#38a8e2][b]Name: Skyrim Portals - The Nexus
Version: 1.1
Date: 2/19/2012
Category: Miscellaneous
Author(s): BluePhantom
Source: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10439[/b][/color]

[color=#ed872d][b][size=3]Mod has been shelved indefinitely. Feel free to use/develop at will. Too busy to mod right now, and just started :([/size][/b][/color]

[color=#007fff][b]==================
Description:
===================[/b][/color]
Skyrim Portals adds \'The Nexus\' a Room containing Teleports to all of Skyrim\'s main cities.

The room can be accesed from the College of Winterhold,
after that a spell allows you to get there from anywhere/anytime.

[color=#007fff][b]===================
Manual Installation
===================[/b][/color]
Place the included files into your data folder and activate the .esp

[color=#007fff][b]===================
Know Bugs/issues
===================[/b][/color]

- Sometimes falling occurs upon entrance - Issue with Spell Script.
- Unkown if compatible with npcs - Working on it.

[color=#007fff][b]===================
Compatibilities
===================[/b][/color]

No Know mod clashes at this time.

[color=#007fff][b]===================
Future/Updates:
===================[/b][/color]

[color=#ed872d][b]No Future for Mod at the Moment.[/b][/color]

[color=#007fff][b]===================
Changelog:
===================[/b][/color]

Skyrim Portals - The Nexus V1.2 - Uploaded to SkyrimNexus
-sound Issues
-Problem with College Teleport
-Spell Tome not spawning properly

Skyrim Portals - The Nexus V1.1
-Small Update

Skyrim Portals - The Nexus V1.0 - Uploaded to SkyrimNexus
-Added in Spelltome for Teleport Spell
-Made the Nexus look a bit better
-Initial release

[color=#007fff][b]===================
Unstallation:
===================[/b][/color]

Remove \'TheNexus.esp\' and \'TheNexus.bsa\' from your data folder.
author: BluePhantom
